Text: Defeat Elektricitie
This is where I \n say goodbye...

The penalties for 
 interfering apply to 
 the gods, just like 
 anyone else.
Creator, you've \n done well.
I guess this is \n what happens \n to old gods, eh?
Raven...
Aww, \n too late.
But then you're \n always too late.
Hahaha!
Nothing can \n stop me now!
I WILL stop you!
I have to pay her back for what she did to Raven, to everyone!
You tried your best. But \n it's time to give up.

I know you won't 
 understand, but let 
 me try to explain why 
 this has to happen...
For the longest time, I \n was wondering how to \n fix this world...
Then, it came to me in a \n dream. A voice from the \n darkness told me how...
It told me to awaken \n the woman in the \n Crystal Palace.

That's when I knew who 
 and what Elektricitie 
 was, and why she was 
 trapped in that crystal.

Our predecessors 
 imprisoned her because 
 they were afraid of her 
 and her power.
But, what a waste.
Why let something so \n powerful go unused...
When you can use it for \n yourself?
I know how we \n can fix everything.

The voice in my dream 
 told me the truth: 
 so long as this town 
 exists, Eto can't be free!
Your power looks \n like it's all run out, \n Auntie...
Too bad for you, \n Elektricitie's power \n is unlimited!
That voice... Cyanea?
Gravity Queen, don't \n fall for the false \n light.
False light?
I grant you the power to \n see the truth, through \n unclouded eyes.
As the Dream Guardian, \n this is my last act...
Now, the world is yours \n to protect.
Cyanea?
Kat, I was having a \n funny dream.
Someone told me I had to \n say goodbye...
I'll miss you, Kat. \n Maybe someday we'll \n meet again.
Goodbye.
No, this can't be \n happening! Elektricitie \n is all-powerful!
So what if a town \n or two has to be \n destroyed?
With her power, \n I could've remade \n the world!
You don't get it...
Those are living, \n breathing people \n in that city!
People with hopes. \n People with dreams.
Who cares? \n There are too many \n people anyway!
Only the select few are \n needed in my new world!
Defeat Elektricitie
More of them... How can I avoid all their attacks?
This is bad...
Mysterious Voice: \n ...at... Kat!
Huh!? It didn't hit me...
That energy... It seems to strike taller things first.
That's it! Using these, I can avoid those attacks.
I need to get away from that!
Dodged it!
I can't abandon the city...
Defeat the True Elektricitie
I can see the real one now!
Those duplicates are almost all gone... Now's my chance.
I can't run from this!
